name: Presscot Mike
description:
i’m presscot mike. Am funny, attractive, reliable, dedicated, professional, caring,
easy to talk with and can make people feel special.
Most especially i am an incurable romantic who works hard to keep a relationship fresh and exciting,
am a successful Man who is passionate about.
Am looking for a good Woman that values truth, hard work, and true love.
A Woman that is ready to share his life and mine,
i want a Woman who i know i can have faith and completely trust with all my heart
cause to make a standard relationship it must really be based on trust.
To know …
I am a honest, caring, understanding, loving, trust-worthy and romantic man.
I am a down to earth man, very independent person., i lost my wife some years ago, and I have a son and a daughter .
